query: Where are shielding gas options for prequalified GMAW procedures listed in AWS D1.1:2025?
expected_answer: Table 5.7 — shielding gas compositions for prequalified GMAW WPS
rationale: Table 5.7 in D1.1:2025 specifies approved shielding gas mixtures (e.g., 75% Ar / 25% CO2) for prequalified GMAW procedures. Changes to gas composition outside these limits require PQR qualification per Clause 6. This table is critical for contractors using prequalified WPS without testing.

citations.excerpt: Shielding gas compositions for prequalified GMAW — Ar/CO2 mixtures
